Keywords: Marauders , Pirate , Quiet Council , X-Men
Real Name: Ororo Munroe
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: ANGEL, ARCHANGEL, BISHOP, COLOSSUS, ICEMAN, JEAN GREY, MARVEL GIRL:: If 2+ listed friendly characters are on the map, when Storm or a listed character attacks, their targets can't have their combat values positively modified. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
02
TEAM UP: BISHOP, CALLISTO, EMMA FROST, ICEMAN, KITTY PRYDE, KATE PRYDE, PYRO: If 1+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Storm and listed friendly characters gain and modify speed +2 if they occupy water terrain. If 4+ are on the map, during your turns printed hindering terrain is water terrain instead. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.
03
TEAM UP: JEAN GREY, MARVEL GIRL, NIGHTCRAWLER: If 1+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Storm and listed friendly characters can use support. If 2+ are on the map, opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire to them can't use Phasing/Teleport, Pulse Wave, Defend, and Support. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
04
TEAM UP: X-MEN THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Storm is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] When Storm is attacked by a character occupying outdoor terrain, Storm can use Energy/ Shield Deflection. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You canï¿½t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters
KRAKOAN REVIVAL: For all characters with this trait, when a friendly standard character with the X-Men keyword and a lower point value would be KO'd by an opposing effect, you may instead choose to turn that character to it's starting click (this game) and place them adjacent to a friendly character that can use this trait. If you do, your opponent scores that character and generates a bystander on this card (of their choice) adjacent to any of their characters. Your opponent then scores 10 points for every bystander they generated this game via this trait, regardless of source.
MY BEST? NO, THE MAIN BOLT IS STILL CHARGING: When Storm hits with a range attack, after resolutions give a hit character a Lightning Rod token. When Storm targets a single character with a Lightning Rod token with a range attack, she modifies damage +3. // At the end of your turn, remove all Lightning Rod tokens that weren't given this turn.

fastcat99
The text of the power says give "a" hit character a token. It's just one total.
April 12, 2021
Warborg
How many lightning rod markers can she dole out? As many the number of hit pieces? I.e. EE on two targets, each with 1 or 2 adjacent & they all get rod tokens?
November 7, 2020
Milbury
Naming your hero team after one of the most evil villain teams they ever fought is still a really dumb idea. But then, Dawn of X is a really dumb book. Getting back on topic, aside from the novelty of a Pirate-keyword Storm, I'm not really impressed by this. Marvel's been banging the drum for years now about how great and powerful Storm is, yet they consistently refuse to give her a figure over 200 points (unless you count Shadow King-possessed Storm from XDPS). Even the cosmic LE Storm couldn't break past 150. Can we get just one goddess-tier figure of this supposed goddess?
November 7, 2020
foxxwertas
If you're reading the Dawn of X stuff you would understand why the team is called that.
November 4, 2020
toomanybatmans
I object to the idea of XMen being on a team called the Marauders. The Marauders murdered countless Morlocks and severely injured the team. This book needs better writers.
